You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &bcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Bcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0411/index.htm U+00411].
  * `&bcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0431/index.htm U+00431].
